messages.subject: Hello new here
messages.msgSnippet: Hello all I am a bit of a lurker on these site. I wanted to put up a small intro about me and my family. We are currently in seattle looking to move to
messages.messageBody:
Hello all I am a bit of a lurker on these site. I wanted to put up a
small intro about me and my family. We are currently in seattle looking
to move to WNY/Derby area. I have a 6yr old and 8yr old boy(s). We have
been unschooling for 2 yrs now. My older son was in Public School for 3
yrs for Dev. preschool for his autism. Now he is home. We have some
hard times with him but overall he is doing wonderful. !!
I am in a bit of a dilema. Well I want to very badly move back to NY to
be with my family but they are not welcoming to the homeschool/unschool
ideas. Being 3000 miles away makes it easier to do. My mom is a teacher
in the lake shore school. I really want to continue unschooling but I
am also afraid it will interfere with my family. Also I see that it is
very hard to homeschool in NY>
Any advice would be wonderful.
THanks
Kasey
